label: replicaCount
description: vanguard deployment replicas and default is 1

label: imageRepository
description: vanguard deployment image repository and default is zdnscloud/vanguard

label: imageTag
description: vanguard deployment image tag and default is v0.1

label: generalLogEnabled
description: vanguard general log enable and default is false

label: cacheEnabled
description: vanguard general cache enable and default is true

label: clusterDnsServer
description: kubernetes cluster dns server ip and default is 10.43.0.10

label: clusterCIDR
description: kubernetes cluster cidr and default is 10.42.0.0/16

label: clusterServerIpRange
description: kubernetes cluster server ip range and default is 10.43.0.0/16
